cast.name: 让-皮埃尔·布伊索 Jean-Pierre Bouyxou
凯瑟琳·卡斯特 Catherine Castel
玛丽-皮埃尔·卡斯特尔 Marie-Pierre Castel

introduction: The story follows young Amy escaping a would-be rapist (played by Rollin!) only to end up in the chateau of charming yet nefarious Gideon. Gideon, quite the swinger, has recently “lost” his wife and is intent on performing some Marquis de Sade-ish sex rituals… and the gang of guys and girls staying at his place are only too happy to oblige. Endless sexual escapades of the guests later, Amy falls under the spell of Gideon and ends up out on the beach with him, surrendering to his every desire. But Gideon is not looking for true love as we soon discover. Is Amy to suffer the same fate as the other women?
